member.name: P:LtGt.HtmlRules.voidElementTagNames
member.summary: List of element tag names that belong to "void elements" category. These elements can't have children and don't need a closing tag.

member.name: P:LtGt.HtmlRules.rawTextElementTagNames
member.summary: List of element tag names that belong to "raw text elements" category. These elements can only contain text inside and that text doesn't need to be encoded.
